3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have clear height/thickness, floor separates well, interior volume is evident. Proper 3D corners. Angled view is good, minimal distortion. Roof is removed cleanly, main interior spaces fully visible. Some minor geometry imperfections in bathroom area, but overall very strong.

geometric_accuracy.notes: All rooms are present with correct adjacency. Room proportions are very well preserved. Major wall positions align perfectly with 2D. Wall lengths are proportional. Internal partitions are correctly placed. All major doors and windows are present and on correct walls, with good proportional sizing and orientation. Slight discrepancy in the 'Entrance to the House' area where the outdoor steps/landing are not fully represented in 3D, and the interior steps for 'UP' are present and accurately depicted.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture (beds, sofas, tables) are present and well-placed. Kitchen elements and bathroom fixtures are also present. Furniture is in correct rooms, and scale is reasonable. Orientation is logical. The 3D model includes more detailed kitchen cabinetry than the 2D plan indicated, which is a positive interpolation.

visual_clarity.notes: The geometry is very readable, walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable. Interior is well-lit and clearly visible without obscuring geometry. Consistent material usage, no major rendering artifacts. The background is clean and aids in presentation. No text labels present.

summary: This is an excellent and geometrically faithful 3D conversion, accurately representing the layout, proportions, and key structural elements from the 2D floor plan with clear visibility and proper 3D rendering fundamentals.
